description: 32 years old. He`s the director of the development department of Mao Industries, and helped create the Gespenst series. Rob is his best friend, and co-worker. He was married to Marion Radom, but they got a divorce due to her not liking the way he acted. He somehow survived the Huckebein 008R`s accident on the Moon. Now he works as the developer for the SRX Project, and has helped on projects such as the Wild Wuerger.
name: Kirk Hamill
